definition: to be collectively called/collective term/general designation
collectively known as/to call sth as a group

sentences.english: Research exceeds a general designation of science and technology below cold condition this kind to learn for microtherm .
sentences.chinese: 探究這種超冷狀態下的科學技術統稱爲低溫學。

sentences.english: The MOFTEC or the SETC is hereinafter uniformly referred to as the investigation organ.
sentences.chinese: 外經貿部和國家經貿委，以下統稱調查機關。

sentences.english: Diabetes mellitus is a group of diseases characterized by high levels of blood sugar.
sentences.chinese: “糖尿病”是一類表現爲高血糖的病症的統稱。

sentences.english: A word that serves as a catchall for a bewildering array of computer accessories.
sentences.chinese: 一個可作爲混雜排列的計算機附件的統稱詞。

sentences.english: Yanshan eight sceneries" is the general designation of eight scenic spots of Beijing."
sentences.chinese: 燕山八景是北京的八處風景名勝的統稱。

sentences.english: Any of about 100 species of small, slender freshwater fishes (family Percidae), native to eastern North America.
sentences.chinese: 鱸形目鱸科鏢鱸亞科約一百種小型細長淡水魚的統稱。

sentences.english: Hydrofining is a process of various oil products upgrading under hydrogen pressure.
sentences.chinese: 加氫精制是各種油品在氫壓下進行催化改質的統稱。

sentences.english: The Chinese police and administration is the general designation of the police and government affairs.
sentences.chinese: 警政是對有關警察的國家和政府事務的統稱。

sentences.english: These are called as mala - the waste, which need to be excreted.
sentences.chinese: 這些東西統稱爲身體垃圾，是必須要被排泄掉的。

sentences.english: Any of several large North or Central American fishes of the genus Lepisosteus.
sentences.chinese: 雀鱔科雀鱔屬的大型魚類的統稱，產於北美或中美。

sentences.english: This chapter is a catchall for all open items that were not performed in previous chapters.
sentences.chinese: 本章是在以前的章節統稱爲所有打開的項目進行了不。

sentences.english: The bouquet and aroma of a wine.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒中酒香和果香的統稱。

sentences.english: In our country and cabernet sauvignon, cabernet franc gernischt, collectively known as it.
sentences.chinese: 在我國與赤霞珠，蛇龍珠，品麗珠統稱爲解百納。

sentences.english: Official documents generally can be called amanuensis materials or files.
sentences.chinese: 公文又統稱文書材料，或稱文件。

sentences.english: The principal muscles involved in hip flexion are the psoas and the iliacus, collectively known as the iliopsoas .
sentences.chinese: 主要涉及肌肉，在髖關節屈曲的腰肌和髂，統稱爲髂。

sentences.english: The Han-style clothes are a tradition with different style in different period.
sentences.chinese: 漢服是個統稱，不同時期有不同的風格。

definition: called/to call sth (by a name)/to name
to belong to (a category)/to be attached to
to view as/to see as/to consider to be/to deem
person (first person, second person etc in grammar)/called/known as
to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
